{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\Q<!-- Example guided tour presented through some HTML slides -- Everything stored in one page --> <html> <head> <title>DocDuck Guided Tour</title> <style> * { margin: 0; box-sizing: border-box } body { display: grid; grid-template-rows: 10vh 90vh; grid-template-columns: 100vw; } nav { grid-row: 1 / 2; background-color: cornflowerblue; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-size: 2.666rem; color: white } .slide-container { grid-row: 2 / 3; display: grid; grid-template-rows: 80% 20%; grid-template-columns: 100%; } .slide-container > .slide-conts { border: 1px solid black; margin: 1vh; grid-row: 1 / 2; display: none; padding: 2vh; } .slide-conts h1 { font-size: 2.333rem; } .slide-conts h2 { font-size: 1.888rem; } .slide-conts p, li { font-size: 1.333rem; } .slide-conts#active { display: inline-block; } .slide-container > .slide-buttons { grid-row: 2 / 3; background-color: cornflowerblue; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: stretch; } </style> </head> <body> <nav> <p class=\"nav-text\">DocDuck Guided Tour</p> </nav> <div class=\"slide-container\"> <div class=\"slide-conts\" id=\"active\" data-current=\"a1\" data-next=\"a2\"> <h1>Introduction</h1> <br> <p>Description about DocDuck and what we are making</p> <br> <ul> <li> Summary Bulletpoints!</li> <li> More Bullet Points</li> <li> Image Example Below</li> </ul> <img src=\"assets/img/image.jpg\" style=\"max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%;\" /> </div> <div class=\"slide-conts\" data-current=\"a2\" data-next=\"a3\"> <h1>Test Slide 2!</h1> <p> Some text about the slide</p> <img src=\"hwg.png\" /> </div> <div class=\"slide-conts\" data-current=\"a3\" data-next=\"a1\"> <h1>Test Slide 3!</h1> <p> Some text about the slide</p> <ul> <li> Bulletpoints!</li> <li>More!</li> </ul> </div> <div class=\"slide-buttons\"> <button onclick=\"nextSlide()\">Next Slide</button> </div> </div> </div> <script> function nextSlide() { // get list of all slides const slides = document.querySelectorAll(\".slide-conts\"); // get current active slide and remove active id const curr_slide = document.querySelector(\"#active\"); curr_slide.id = \"\"; //get next slide with data-current == data-next let next = curr_slide.dataset.next; for ( let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++ ) { if ( slides[i].dataset.current == next ) { console.log(\"Switched to next slide\"); slides[i].id=\"active\"; } } } </script> </body> </html>\\E$"}
{"rule":"COMMA_PARENTHESIS_WHITESPACE","sentence":"^\\Q<!-- Example guided tour presented through some HTML slides -- Everything stored in one page --> <html> <head> <title>DocDuck Guided Tour</title> <style> * { margin: 0; box-sizing: border-box } body { display: grid; grid-template-rows: 10vh 90vh; grid-template-columns: 100vw; } nav { grid-row: 1 / 2; background-color: cornflowerblue; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-size: 2.666rem; color: white } .slide-container { grid-row: 2 / 3; display: grid; grid-template-rows: 80% 20%; grid-template-columns: 100%; } .slide-container > .slide-conts { border: 1px solid black; margin: 1vh; grid-row: 1 / 2; display: none; padding: 2vh; } .slide-conts h1 { font-size: 2.333rem; } .slide-conts h2 { font-size: 1.888rem; } .slide-conts p, li { font-size: 1.333rem; } .slide-conts#active { display: inline-block; } .slide-container > .slide-buttons { grid-row: 2 / 3; background-color: cornflowerblue; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: stretch; } </style> </head> <body> <nav> <p class=\"nav-text\">DocDuck Guided Tour</p> </nav> <div class=\"slide-container\"> <div class=\"slide-conts\" id=\"active\" data-current=\"a1\" data-next=\"a2\"> <h1>Introduction</h1> <br> <p>Description about DocDuck and what we are making</p> <br> <ul> <li> Summary Bulletpoints!</li> <li> More Bullet Points</li> <li> Image Example Below</li> </ul> <img src=\"assets/img/image.jpg\" style=\"max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%;\" /> </div> <div class=\"slide-conts\" data-current=\"a2\" data-next=\"a3\"> <h1>Test Slide 2!</h1> <p> Some text about the slide</p> <img src=\"hwg.png\" /> </div> <div class=\"slide-conts\" data-current=\"a3\" data-next=\"a1\"> <h1>Test Slide 3!</h1> <p> Some text about the slide</p> <ul> <li> Bulletpoints!</li> <li>More!</li> </ul> </div> <div class=\"slide-buttons\"> <button onclick=\"nextSlide()\">Next Slide</button> </div> </div> </div> <script> function nextSlide() { // get list of all slides const slides = document.querySelectorAll(\".slide-conts\"); // get current active slide and remove active id const curr_slide = document.querySelector(\"#active\"); curr_slide.id = \"\"; //get next slide with data-current == data-next let next = curr_slide.dataset.next; for ( let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++ ) { if ( slides[i].dataset.current == next ) { console.log(\"Switched to next slide\"); slides[i].id=\"active\"; } } } </script> </body> </html>\\E$"}
{"rule":"ARROWS","sentence":"^\\Q<!-- Example guided tour presented through some HTML slides -- Everything stored in one page --> <html> <head> <title>DocDuck Guided Tour</title> <style> * { margin: 0; box-sizing: border-box } body { display: grid; grid-template-rows: 10vh 90vh; grid-template-columns: 100vw; } nav { grid-row: 1 / 2; background-color: cornflowerblue; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-size: 2.666rem; color: white } .slide-container { grid-row: 2 / 3; display: grid; grid-template-rows: 80% 20%; grid-template-columns: 100%; } .slide-container > .slide-conts { border: 1px solid black; margin: 1vh; grid-row: 1 / 2; display: none; padding: 2vh; } .slide-conts h1 { font-size: 2.333rem; } .slide-conts h2 { font-size: 1.888rem; } .slide-conts p, li { font-size: 1.333rem; } .slide-conts#active { display: inline-block; } .slide-container > .slide-buttons { grid-row: 2 / 3; background-color: cornflowerblue; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: stretch; } </style> </head> <body> <nav> <p class=\"nav-text\">DocDuck Guided Tour</p> </nav> <div class=\"slide-container\"> <div class=\"slide-conts\" id=\"active\" data-current=\"a1\" data-next=\"a2\"> <h1>Introduction</h1> <br> <p>Description about DocDuck and what we are making</p> <br> <ul> <li> Summary Bulletpoints!</li> <li> More Bullet Points</li> <li> Image Example Below</li> </ul> <img src=\"assets/img/image.jpg\" style=\"max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%;\" /> </div> <div class=\"slide-conts\" data-current=\"a2\" data-next=\"a3\"> <h1>Test Slide 2!</h1> <p> Some text about the slide</p> <img src=\"hwg.png\" /> </div> <div class=\"slide-conts\" data-current=\"a3\" data-next=\"a1\"> <h1>Test Slide 3!</h1> <p> Some text about the slide</p> <ul> <li> Bulletpoints!</li> <li>More!</li> </ul> </div> <div class=\"slide-buttons\"> <button onclick=\"nextSlide()\">Next Slide</button> </div> </div> </div> <script> function nextSlide() { // get list of all slides const slides = document.querySelectorAll(\".slide-conts\"); // get current active slide and remove active id const curr_slide = document.querySelector(\"#active\"); curr_slide.id = \"\"; //get next slide with data-current == data-next let next = curr_slide.dataset.next; for ( let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++ ) { if ( slides[i].dataset.current == next ) { console.log(\"Switched to next slide\"); slides[i].id=\"active\"; } } } </script> </body> </html>\\E$"}
